home.title: Welcome to our organization Journey UA
home.description: Journey UA is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization created to help newly arrived Ukrainians affected by the war. Since 2022, we have been helping Ukrainian refugees with relocation and adaptation in the USA
home.housingTitle: Housing in Minneapolis without the hassle
home.housingDescription: We know how important it is to have a warm and reliable place, especially when you're just arriving in a new city. That's why our team is ready to help you find housing quickly, simply, and without stress.
